body_html: @ezyang "There's a lot of reindenting going on in this diff, which makes it hard to tell what the changes are." - take a look at the "Hide whitespace changes" checkbox under "Diff settings" at the top of the diff. It's analogous to -w on the command line
body_text: @ezyang "There's a lot of reindenting going on in this diff, which makes it hard to tell what the changes are." - take a look at the "Hide whitespace changes" checkbox under "Diff settings" at the top of the diff. It's analogous to -w on the command line
body: @ezyang "There's a lot of reindenting going on in this diff, which makes it hard to tell what the changes are." - take a look at the "Hide whitespace changes" checkbox under "Diff settings" at the top of the diff. It's analogous to `-w` on the command line
